title: (x) Concepts & Treatment: Odyssey - Lexia {Metadox}
content:
That "&" made this a lot easier...   
   
Looks like [Lexia](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525174631/http:/www.daltonmaag.com/fonts/exclusives/lexia.html?picpage=1), from Dalton Maag. [[test drive](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525174631/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/daltonmaag/lexia-da-ma/bold/testdrive.html?s=Concepts%20%26&p=52)]
author: metadox
